original: Every time you Unlock<#00ff00>{0}</color> achievements, you can allocate an additional attribute point when creating a character. The maximum additional attribute points are <#00ff00>{1}</color>, and the current additional attribute points are <#00ff00>{2}</color>
context: 每解锁<#00ff00>{0}</color>个成就，在创角时可额外分配1点属性点，额外属性点上限为<#00ff00>{1}</color>，当前额外属性点为<#00ff00>{2}</color>

original: Start with <#00ff00>{0}</color> achievement points. Each time you Unlock an achievement, you can get additional achievement points. You can use these points to choose suitable traits when starting the game.
context: 开局初始<#00ff00>{0}</color>成就点，每解锁1个成就可以额外获得成就点，在开局时可以消耗成就点数选择适合自己的特征。

original:
Tip 1: Achievement points from Unlock achievements can be used to choose suitable traits at the start of the game
Tip 2: Initial items from Unlock achievements can be chosen as starting items at the start of the game
context:
提示1：成就解锁的成就点可在开局消耗选择适合自己的特征
提示2：成就解锁的初始道具可在开局作为初始道具进行选择

original: Monopolizing the Head of the Turtle
Complete all Langya Sword Pavillion events.
context: 完成琅琊剑阁相关事件。

original: Complete all Blue Wind Camp events.
Complete all Nest of Swallow events.
Complete all Crime Investigation Bureau events.
Reach max level of any Resource skill.
context: 任一项采集类能力达到登峰造极。

original: Reach max level of any Craft skill.
context: 任一项制造类能力达到登峰造极。

original: Reach max level of any Appraise skill.
context: 任一项鉴定类能力达到登峰造极。

original: Reach max level of any Survival skill.
context: 任一项生存类能力达到登峰造极。

original: Reach max level of any Rogue skill.
context: 任一项市井类能力达到登峰造极。

original: Recruit all Nameless Village characters (Hunter, Informant, Blacksmith, Doctor, Innkeeper).
context: 无名小村猎户、包打听、铁匠、郎中、老板娘同时入队。

original: At the start of the game, defeat Nest of Swallow's reinforcement force.
context: 开局在野外击败燕子窝的援军。

original: Destroy Blue Wind Camp in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭青风寨。

original: Destroy Nest of Swallow in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭燕子窝。

original: Destroy Crime Investigation Bureau in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭神捕门。

original: Destroy Langya Sword Pavillion in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭琅琊剑阁。

original: Destroy Taoist Sect in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭道玄宗。

original: First time forming a good relationship with a female partner.
context: 首次与女性伙伴缔结良缘。

original: Formed a good relationship with 7 female partners.
context: 与7名女性伙伴缔结良缘。

original: Win all money from the dealer for the first time.
context: 玩骰子首次赢光庄家大部分钱财。

original: Win all money from the dealer 20 times in total.
context: 玩骰子使庄家封盘，累计20次。
在“龙舟论粽大赛”中胜出。

original: Storm into Yan Army Camp and annihilate all enemies.
context: 前往燕国行辕大营选择直接剿灭燕云铁军。

original: Rescue the Emperor from Yan Army Camp, then take his offer.
context: 从燕云铁军中救出皇帝，接受皇帝封赏。

original: Win the titles Provincial Top Examiner, Country Top Examiner and Top Achiever.
context: 获得解元、会元、状元身份。

original: Destroy Shifa Temple in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭释法寺。
消灭燕云铁军势力中所有重要人物。

original: Destroy Confucius Temple in an official way.
context: 光明正大的方式剿灭儒圣馆。

original: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 300.
context: 自由难度下难度系数达到300 达成真结局。

original: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 600.
context: 自由难度下难度系数达到600 达成真结局。

original: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 900.
context: 自由难度下难度系数达到900 达成真结局。

original: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 1200.
context: 自由难度下难度系数达到1200 达成真结局。

original: Trigger the "Nine Factions Sect Master" ending.
After becoming a disciple in Nameless Village, you can become a Jianghu Master or Jianghu Conqueror.
context: 无名小村拜师后，最终成为武林盟主或武林霸主。

original: After becoming a disciple in Nameless Village, you can trigger the "Loyalty" ending.
context: 无名小村拜师后，触发“尽忠报国”结局。

original: After becoming a disciple in Nameless Village, you can trigger the "Number One in the World" ending.
context: 无名小村拜师后，触发“天下第一”结局。

original: Join the Yan Yun Iron Army.
